relnotes.name: EUserHl Library
relnotes.purpose: Generic Usability Library. Contains self-managing string class and class templates for automatic resource management.
relnotes.defect: Rectified the header classifications wherever necessary, either including it in .cpp or promoting it
Added appropriate comments for the corresponding coverity checker

defect.title: LString16 and LString8 should directly support Cpp string literals - part 2

relnotes.defect: Support for natural cpp string literals.

defect.title: Investigate on EnsureCapacityL api and update documentation associated with it

relnotes.defect: The documentation associated with EnsureCapacityL method has been updated,since the method is no longer supported.

defect.title: ManagedPopCleanupStackItem linker error for multiply defined symbols

relnotes.defect: ManagedPopCleanupStackItem method has been templated to get rid of the linker error for multiple defined symbols.

deliverystep.name: PREQ2475: Splitting Mixed Header files for Base Services API
deliverystep.preq: Splitting Mixed Header files for Base Services API

relnotes.defect: The example code fixed and released for developers to use EUserHl.

defect.title: gccxml build failure due to euserhl component

relnotes.defect: fix for gccxml build failure due to euserhl component .

defect.title: Upgrade EUserHL to the new version of EManaged

relnotes.defect: Upgradation of EuserHL code has been done to use the latest emanaged code as a part of cleanup strategy.

defect.title: SWAP_Wordscan: Fix the profanity found in Base Services code

relnotes.defect: Fix the profanity found in Base Services code

defect.title: EUserHL does not build on v9.1

relnotes.defect: EUserHL updated to build an all Symbian OS v9.x releases when SYMBIAN_EUSERHL_BUILD91 defined.

deliverystep.name: PREQ2177: New EUserHl Library - CleanupStack and Descriptor Alternative
